(Ranked among top 6 schools in the world in computer science as per the QS World University Rankings 2024) Research Interests [More details] [Google Scholar Profile] Motive: My scholarly endeavors are driven by principle of “Science in Service to Society." Current focus: My current research interests are at the intersection of cybersecurity, privacy, trust, and fairness, with a focus on multimodal data.
